derivatives.name: V6 Fastback
derivatives.standardFeatures:
• Rear View Camera
  • HID headlamps with signature lighting
  • Easy Fuel capless fuel filler
  • SOS Post-Crash Alert System

features.name: 4-Speed automatic transmission with Sequential Sports Shift
features.noteAssigned: E-Gas engine available on XR6 from July 2009 production.

features.name: E-Gas 4.0L DOHC DI-VCT I6 (Dedicated LPG)
features.noteAssigned: E-Gas engine available on XR6 from July 2009 production.

features.name: Virtual Pivot Control Link Front Suspension
Sports Control Blade Independent Rear Suspension (IRS)
17" x 8" XR 5-spoke alloy wheels - 245/45 R17 tyres
18" x 8" XR 5-spoke alloy wheels - 245/40 R18 tyres
features.noteAssigned: Wheels and tyres sold separately when Dealer fitted. Not available on XR6 with optional eGas engine.

features.name: 19" x 8" XR 5-spoke alloy wheels - 245/35 R19 tyres
features.noteAssigned: Not available on XR6 with optional eGas engine.

features.name: Type
features.value: Forward mounted power assisted rack and pinion

features.name: Front
features.value: Standard vented disc brakes with twin piston caliper

features.name: Rear
features.value: Standard solid disc brake with single piston caliper

features.name: Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
features.value: 4-Channel ABS with Electronic Brakeforce Distribution (EBD) and Emergency Brake Assist (EBA)

features.name: Dynamic Stability Control (DSC)
features.value: Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) incorporates Traction Control System (TCS), Emergency Brake Assist (EBA) and 4-channel ABS with Electronic Brakeforce Distribution (EBD)

features.name: Cruise control with steering wheel mounted switches
Human Machine Interface (HMI) with Interior Command Centre
Multi Function Display including distance to empty, average speed, average fuel consumption, speed warning
Front
features.value: Virtual Pivot Control Link front suspension

features.name: Sports body kit - side skirts and rear bumper
Standard audio system with monochrome display, AM/FM radio, single slot CD and 4 speakers (total 112 watts)
Premium audio system with 7" colour display, AM/FM radio, 6-disc in-dash CD and 8 speakers plus 150 watt amplifier and sub-woofer (total 262 watts)
Satellite navigation system with Suna Traffic Channel
Remote keyless entry with two remote control flip keys
Engine management
features.value: Powertrain control module incorporating electronic throttle control
